>Since we use multiple threads to build up Jpanels representing 
>different phone screens, very often we also get the following 
>exceptions which don't seem to cause any problems, but still 
>it's better that the cause can be identified :)
>
>1)
>FINE: Tue Oct 17 19:22:00 EEST 2006    java.io.EOFException
